name: Lanyard and Badge ID Reel
description:
Badge Reel W/ Clear Vinyl Strap & Swivel Spring Clip.
Full 360 Degree Rotation
Great for Hospitals
Attaches to Nearly Any Part of Any Garment 
The cord of the reel extends up to 34", so it offers enough reach to easily pull your ID card towards your e-reader from the badge reel, and the reel will then roll back into its idle position on its own accord. the lanyard does provide a breakaway feature, it has a firm enough grip to prevent the lanyard from snapping apart when the reel is being used. The lanyard is 36" total circumference, so it should hang right in the center of your torso, above or close enough to your belly button for easy display.

name: Key Fob/Wristlet
description:
Never lose your keys again easy for your wrist yet flexible and comfortable to wear

o These trendy patterned key fobs are made from fabulous designer fabrics by Amy Butler, Michael Miller, Momo and Erin Mc Morris just to name a few.
o Durable 100% heavy duty cotton webbing
o Securely doubled stitched at the bottom so no loose ends can be frayed
o Key Fobs are 10” in diameter and 1 ¼ wide looping easy enough to keep around your wrist
o My special signature stitching

Key Fobs are perfect gifts for:
Teachers
Family
Friends
Everyone

For Every occasion
Graduations, Family Reunions, Charity events
